Prepare the data protocols promised by the server and client => DataLib project How to use EF core in ASP.NET Core => ServerApp project Build DB table using DataLib I couldn't put the array into the DB because I used the DB as sqlite for practice. Import DataLib from Unity (client) and communicate REST API with server => UnityClient Commanding dotnet build in DataLib tells it to copy build files to the Unity Assets folder. Check communication with the server
